item.title: How do i change what npcs say?
item.dc:creator: @mresi5656 mresi5656
item.description:
@mresi5656 wrote:

Say you’re trying to make an easter bunny say “I love Easter!”

This is what you would do
Open NPChandler.java
Press CTRL+F and type

moo

You’ll see something like this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; }

After the last bracket, press enter and insert this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1835) { if (misc.random2(22) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "I love Easter!"; }

Hope that was helpful

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change what npcs say?

item.title: How do i change what npcs say?
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

Go to NPCHandler.java Press Ctrl + f and Search “Moo” Copy and paste it right under it, and where it has a number like 211 or something (NPC ID) Change it, and where it says moo, thats where you put what you want the NPC To say.

Your welcome, If you don’t understand still PM Me.

Read full topic
